channel.title: VPS Setup Help
channel.description:
Okay I just bought a vps from X10 Hosting, and I don't know what the hell to do... :(
Here's a screenie of the cpanel. [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/ixwk68.png[/img]
What do I do to make it run the server? Should I use a ftp server or what? Please help, I know this may be in wrong section, but idk where else to put.

item.title: VPS Setup Help
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Ollie123:

Why would you even buy a vps in the first place if you don’t know how to use it?

yeah, i’m sure tracy would be made you’re wasting her money!!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Why would you even buy a vps in the first place if you don’t know how to use it?

item.title: VPS Setup Help
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“yesimanub, post:2, topic:449311”]from my knowledge you should set up a remote desktop connection.
You can get there by Startmenu>search “remote desktop connecton”>

Where it says computer, put that as your vps ip, username should be admin and password is the one on the vps.

Not sure if this would work but that’s what we did on vpsland.[/quote]
took bad it’s not a windows machine?

OP: you’ll need a ssh client to connect

Read full topic

item.title: VPS Setup Help
item.dc:creator: @yesimanub yesimanub
item.description:
@yesimanub wrote:

from my knowledge you should set up a remote desktop connection.
You can get there by Startmenu>search “remote desktop connecton”>

Where it says computer, put that as your vps ip, username should be admin and password is the one on the vps.

Not sure if this would work but that’s what we did on vpsland.

Read full topic
